title: INDISPUTABLE proof that Rengar is a HEALTHY champion

replies.body: Thats pretty old
Indeed and it's funny how a lot of people on the boards are getting brainwashed with posts like this.
Considering it still happens.

No it doesn't lol


Compare Current Rengar to whatever the fuck I just watched was.

Big difference

Alright, real talk: rengar is a very balanced:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HWFAMcRbcoY

just take a look at this fresh video only, uploaded a couple hours ago for indisputable proof.
Rengar was level 17 and vayne was level 13 with less then half Hp. I dont care who it is. You're going to die to a level 17 instantly

> [{quoted}](name=InvalidGuest,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-09-08T05:51:24.422+0000)
>
> Alright, real talk: rengar is a very balanced:
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HWFAMcRbcoY
> 
> just take a look at this fresh video only, uploaded a couple hours ago for indisputable proof.

700 hp Vayne dies to rengar?
The problem isn't Rengar killing people, it's Rengar killing people _instantaneously_.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=0000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T06:17:41.668+0000)
>
> The problem isn't Rengar killing people, it's Rengar killing people _instantaneously_.

Many champions can do it - all the stealth based assasins, Riven, all the ADCs with crits, all burst mages after stacking AP.

AD Rengar doesn't work vs teams who group, teamfight and take objectives, use oracles and pink wards.

> [{quoted}](name=MLDzXnRRR,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=00000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T06:23:27.272+0000)
>
> Many champions can do it - all the stealth based assasins, Riven, all the ADCs with crits, all burst mages after stacking AP.
> 
> AD Rengar doesn't work vs teams who group, teamfight and take objectives, use oracles and pink wards.

Champions like Eve/Talon are fine with stealth. 

Eve doesn't straight blow you up and if Talon pops his ult before jumping on you he's doing it wrong.

Rengar is a completely different thing, he just stealths, nonchalantly walks to your back line, leaps onto your ADC from miles away, and proceeds to instantly blow them up. And unlike Talon, he doesn't lose a good a chunk of damage by popping his stealth first.

> [{quoted}](name=Snowy Poro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=000000000000000000010000000000000001,timestamp=2015-09-08T11:38:57.747+0000)
>
> Champions like Eve/Talon are fine with stealth. 
> 
> Eve doesn't straight blow you up and if Talon pops his ult before jumping on you he's doing it wrong.
> 
> Rengar is a completely different thing, he just stealths, nonchalantly walks to your back line, leaps onto your ADC from miles away, and proceeds to instantly blow them up. And unlike Talon, he doesn't lose a good a chunk of damage by popping his stealth first.

Talon deals insane AOE dmg that can kill the whole enemy team or at least half their hp, if they are full tanks. He is the opposite of Rengar who can kill 1 target and usually dies stunned after that,

> [{quoted}](name=MLDzXnRRR,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=0000000000000000000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-09-08T12:28:47.912+0000)
>
> Talon deals insane AOE dmg that can kill the whole enemy team or at least half their hp, if they are full tanks. He is the opposite of Rengar who can kill 1 target and usually dies stunned after that,

All he has to do is kill the carry and he's done his job. Even if "he dies stunned after that"

And Talon you can see coming, you can prepare for Talon. The only thing you can prepare with Rengar is your anus.

Well i mean warding is out of the reals of possibilities, aint it? 

And isnt it in assasins job description to kill the carries?
uhh prepare for talon? any decent talon will blow you up before you react js

If an assassin has 4 levels over the squishy that has no armor built, and that squishy is at half health... any assassin can delete them instantaneously.

It's what assassins do. 

I'd like to see a video where a Rengar has the same level, the target is full health, and both have relatively the same gold income. The more controlled variables we have, the more we can get out of the results.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZgX-W2sl9qI
Thank you, that's a lot better.
June 2015: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2wdXgBeqEc
Can we stop posting huge level gaps between champions and calling them OP

> [{quoted}](name=Salidfingers,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T06:36:13.285+0000)
>
> Can we stop posting huge level gaps between champions and calling them OP

Seriously.

May 2015: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZgX-W2sl9qI

I figured I'd post the previous video since it was a tutorial on how to delete people
no guys lets just nerf azir right?????????????

We're buffing Lee Sin because even though he's strong in pro play, he sucks at low levels.

We're nerfing Azir because even though he sucks at low levels, he's strong in pro play.

You guys don't seem to get it. This is indisputable proof that Rengar is a healthy champion because he makes sure to remove unhealthy champs like Vayne from the match.

:D
Cancer, meet chemo.
exactly.
Well that's certainly one way of looking at it

A squishy that build absolutely not resists gets deleted by a burst assassin.

:/

What do you expect? You build no resists, you take more damage. And I'm honestly not feeling any pity for the Vayne player >.>

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-09-07T20:57:17.198+0000)
>
> A squishy that build absolutely not resists gets deleted by a burst assassin.
> 
> :/
> 
> What do you expect? You build no resists, you take more damage. And I'm honestly not feeling any pity for the Vayne player >.>

The difference is that most assassins actually have some measure of counterplay. Rengar gives you no warning and then instantly kills you.

Yea, because having a huge ass exclamation mark is soooooo hard to notice........ 

Oh wait.....

and then his entire kit is down and you (gasp) kill him

{{champion:238}} presses R to get back safely
{{champion:55}}  Presses E to Shunpo back
{{champion:84}} casts shroud and either runs away or maybe goes back in for seconds

look at the entire kit before you whine about a champ being OP
Did u not see how Vayne got delete?

Yes, Rengar popped his ultimate and his Q.

I'm going to admit that it's excessive, due to the hydra exploit, but generally an assassin is going to delete a squishy that doesn't build to survive.

What do you want to happen if an assassin blows their entire kit on a defenseless adc that has no armor built and has no tanks or utility supports nearby to protect them? The adc to survive with half health or something? You know what would happen if Vayne survived? She would E him onto the wall and he would probably die to him. Assassins are supposed to kill the adc, that's their intended role.

So I'm going to ask you this: assuming the hydra exploit was fixed, what *should* happen in this kind of situation? **I'm willing to listen,** tell me what should have gone down.

I agree. i have yet to figute out what this circle jerk is about here on Rengar.

He's a full AD Assassin that

1. Blew ALL of his skill
2. Blew ALL of his actives
3. Used them all used them all in a flawless are coordinated method

and we want to ask why the hell the squishies with no resists and 1.3-1.8k health Died to this guy when he literally threw everything he owned AND could take out a loan for at them?

I mean really people. {{champion:238}}  does the same damn thing but just 2 seconds slower and with CONSIDERABLY more safety. Rengar practically has to take a walk of shame away from wherever he left his last bloody mess at because everything is now on cooldown.

We really wanna whine the {{champion:107}}  does it so fast when he leaves himself so much more vulnerable than other assassins ({{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:55}} ) when they've finished killing people.

talon not as safe as kat and zed but his ult can kill secure and be used to excape at the same time. kat can shumpo and zed can shadow out.

these guys really just need to take the Entire champion into account. and not just his time to kill your lonesome and isolated ass when you should have been leg humping your team like a good adc.

That's a Hydra exploit, not part of Rengar's actual kit. Hydra is what needs fixing if you want this to not happen. It less him Queue his Q (The Attack damage nuke boost which can crit) several times so they basically apply at the same time. Add the roar and that's around 2.4K damage burst in lategame full build. Because the Hydra.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-09-07T20:57:17.198+0000)

0.001 seconds and she's dead, yeah sure, balanced

> [{quoted}](name=Twinception,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2015-09-07T23:03:20.452+0000)
>
> 0.001 seconds and she's dead, yeah sure, balanced

Happens to everyone when it comes to a squishy adc vs an assassin.
Zed blows them up guaranteed if they have no cleanse.
Evelynn straight up annihalates them after building AP.
Master yi will.
Vi will.

Anyone that is straight up damage can delete a squishy ADC in an extremely short time.

> [{quoted}](name=Bears Dont Care,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2015-09-08T02:10:18.851+0000)

> Zed blows them up guaranteed if they have no cleanse.
> Evelynn straight up annihalates them after building AP.
> Master yi will.
> Vi will.
> 
> Anyone that is straight up damage can delete a squishy ADC in an extremely short time.

NO other champions can kill someone as fast as Rengar does.
not even a fed katarina, that's 0.01 seconds right there. there's 0 counterplay, when you know he's there, its already too late to put a pink or anything that you might say would help, because he kill's you in 0.01 seconds, as a support, you have to predict the exact millisecond where rengar will jump, so you can cancel it, shield your adc (lol wont help anyway) or if you're janna, just slap him in the face.
Anything to see _specifically_ {{champion:67}} getting one shotted. Upvoted
That isn't that uncommon. Any fed assassin or mage can one shot Vayne.
1 Q was all it took. I expect {{champion:112}} to one shot her with just his Q.
"I have 1000 health. Why did a champion who is notorious for dealing burst damage kill me so fast?"
Dude, this was the old Rengar when he could charge the second aa midair. Now he has a way less burst then before.
I played a game of Rengar today. That's basically what I did to their MF.

Very healthy champ. He kills cancer, just look at it guys! :D

edit: on the real tho, what's the build?

> [{quoted}](name=The Loveless,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2015-09-08T05:21:07.213+0000)
>
> Very healthy champ. He kills cancer, just look at it guys! :D
> 
> edit: on the real tho, what's the build?

Hydra, Brutalizer, Ghostblade, BC, LW, Triforce 

This is Ninfang (Ryan Choi), check his youtube montages.
I don't know if he is still using this build. Some Rengars go for IE and PD now.
Yeah, that champion with a 47.6% win rate is clearly super overpowered. No way to counter him or beat him at all.

> [{quoted}](name=Zhugan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=s6ET7eJb,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2015-09-08T14:58:22.958+0000)
>
> Yeah, that champion with a 47.6% win rate is clearly super overpowered. No way to counter him or beat him at all.

You realize that winrate isn't the only indicator of a champion's balance. Hence the fact that Azir just got nerfed even though he was at a sub 50 winrate and Ryze can't be buffed even though is winrate is incredibly low.

This Rengar builds full armor pen (Hydra, Brutalizer, Ghostblade, BC, LW, Triforce), I've watched him on youtube, so he is  basically dealing true dmg.
Other Rengars  build full crit for even greater burst vs squishies, but can't deal with tanks unlike the armor pen build.
